website_summaries.verdict: Sexy with a low-cut layer underneath, or extra tacky paired with a turtleneck.
pros: Women's cardigan can be worn over a variety of tops
Cute pattern may not be "ugly" to all
Long enough to wear with leggings

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Was Looking For - Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is somewhat large, but it's exactly what I wanted!! I got a medium - I'm 5'5" and 155lbs and it fit like an oversized cardigan dress. It covered by bum and was long enough in the front. Great, thick quality as well!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Knight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas Sweater!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why this is labeled “ugly Christmas sweater” because it’s so cute! It fits well. It’s not made to be form fitting and after wearing it all day, it stretched a little and looked boxy, but that’s not a problem to me. It’s super festive and fun and warm! It’s well made and thick. I will wear this for many years to come! Super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Jo

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. It's a thicker knit and long enough to wear with leggings without showing camel toe.
customer_reviews.author: Misti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any Ugly Christmas party
customer_reviews.text: It looks just as picture. The tree and wreath are glittery which you cannot see in the picture. It’s runs a little large depends on how you like the fit. I ordered an xl and it’s is roomy and long enough to cover past my hips which is what I wanted so I can wear it with leggings. It medium weight I plan to wear it to go see Elf playing at an old theatre downtown and to wear to work for our office Christmas lunch. Pretty ugly to me unless your over 50 and you would probably think it was cute!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Wimberly

customer_reviews.title: I love this sweater
customer_reviews.text: I love this sweater. Super cute for an ugly sweater, covers my butt (I'm 5'8") and very thick and warm. I'm actually happy to say this fit somewhat large, it will be perfect with leggings :)
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cardigan, Soft, and 100% Cotton
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled when I received my order yesterday. The quality of this sweater is absolutely AMAZING. It's made of 100% cotton, and is soft and comfortable to wear over my festive color turtleneck. I've seen Christmas sweaters with price tags up to $60 that don't even compare to the quality of this one! I only wish this came in other designs because I'd buy them all for gifts. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Down to Earth Gal

customer_reviews.title: really cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a small or medium, I wanted this to be a little bigger and not tight. I went with the advice of other reviews and got the small and it fits as I expected it to from the descriptions, it's slightly loose, so it's perfect. I'm 5'1" and 120 lbs. It's very comfy and cute, great price.
customer_reviews.author: noky64

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Christmas Sweater. It's not in any means ugly. Can't wait to wear it to a party. Long enough to wear with leggings. I'm 5' 4" 160 lbs. and ordered a sz LX to ware it buttoned up with leggings as shown.
customer_reviews.author: EasyToPlease

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5" - 150 lbs wear a 36DD bra size and ordered a Medium size, it fits exactly how I like it, not too small, not too big, just perfect, the only thing a bit long were the sleeves which I have no problem just folding them a bit to make them look to size.
customer_reviews.author: Imelda Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality “ugly” sweater
customer_reviews.text: This fit is perfect! I usually wear women’s large/12, and I purchased this sweater in L. It’s a roomy fit, which is perfect for wearing with skinny pants/leggings. The quality seems very good, and I wore a few times over the holiday season—no signs of pilling or stretching. I have not washed it yet. It’s fun and festive. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: V. Costanzo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sweater
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. Fits my wife great. She loves it. It's a really well made sweater as well. This time of year you see a lot of cheap knock off sweaters that are just made to be funny....but not this. It's really well made and looks nice too. My wife wears it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great holiday sweater
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this sweater. Great length, perfect size, good decent weight fit warmth. No cheap materials or faded colors. Had a lot of compliments when I wore it. I'm 5'10, 210 lbs and it fit great
customer_reviews.author: Missy2beTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Cute Ugly Sweater!
customer_reviews.text: I got so many compliments on my cute ugly sweater!! I actually love more the fact that it is not one bit itchy, it's very comfortable!! Definitely long (I have an average torso length) but I wanted that. Arms are a bit long, but I can work with that, so this would be great if you have longer arms!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kubiszewski

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love this sweater! I got one for my sister and mom too. We are adorable, even if my husband rolls his eyes whenever he sees us. I thought the "ugly sweater" fad was a great idea so I got this as a gag. Secretly I've always wanted and liked ugly sweaters. It's %100 cotton, very soft and well made. High quality stitching and very comfortable. If you have a sense of humor and like to be comfy- buy this sweater!
customer_reviews.author: Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sweater, my new favorite
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS SWEATER! I ordered small as other reviewers suggested and it was a perfect fit. I’m 5’3 so most sweaters are long on me but I didn’t want it too long so the large was perfect for me. It was nice and breathable, Comfy, and I got a lot of Compliments. Just wish there were pockets :/
customer_reviews.author: Janine Klinger

customer_reviews.title: U dont get what u see in the picture be careful
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the sweater in the picture i got a similar sweater not the one in the picture, the one i got had all green sleeves, too much green for me, i ordered it twice just to see if it was a mistake in the first order, when i got my second one, same issue, both got returned.
customer_reviews.author: Zina Weber

customer_reviews.title: I’m usually a large but I wanted it to fit almost like a dress so XL worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Size up if you want it to fit loose. I’m usually a large but I wanted it to fit almost like a dress so XL worked perfectly. LOVE IT, kept getting compliments on my “sweater dress” lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits big
customer_reviews.text: Fits really big. I read the reviews and I usually wear an XL or Large. So I ordered a large. Could of easily fit more comfortably into a medium. I'm going to try and shrink it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Smith

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly as pictured, and will be totally suitable ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as pictured, and will be totally suitable for the designated Christmas party of the same name. It isn't as long on me as it appears on the model - only comes to my waist.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Not an "ugly" Christmas sweater!
customer_reviews.text: I received so many compliments on this sweater! It's actually cute - not ugly at all. It fits well and is quite well-made for the price. I wore it several times during the holidays, and it hasn't stretched out or gotten "baggy" like some cheap sweater weaves can get.
customer_reviews.author: CarolAnn P.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I got this to wear to an office Christmas party. It’s not tacky but very cute. I am excited to wear it. It seems to run a bit large in the arms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good one!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a sweater for a goofy Christmas quartet I'm in. Figured I couldn't go wrong for twenty bucks. Wow! It's really cute and the quality is quite good!!
customer_reviews.author: Wonder Woman

customer_reviews.title: Fit almost as expected
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows the top button around the sternum and mine came and the top button was at the abdomen. So it didn't button up correctly as it shows in the picture. Other than that it was warm and at least I had an ugly sweater for the ugly sweater night!
customer_reviews.author: Suzzy Q

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm sweater
customer_reviews.text: This is a very warm sweater. Fit as expected and appears to be well made. It came out of the laundry really nice. I dried it on a low setting until it was almost dry and let it hang dry on a hanger. It looks perfect. I would buy again from this co.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Love it, runs large!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sweater, nice design, and normally I wear a XXL, but after reading the reviews, I opted for the XL, glad I did I am 5'6" and 200# 🙁, great fit!
customer_reviews.author: tvilleknees

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is excellent for the price and it got here in time. It’s sufficiently “ugly” with bright colors and large illustrations. The material is a regular sweater material (I expected it to be thin and “disposable” for the price). I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: Only had mediums left so I went for it. I am 5'6 and this completely covers my butt. I wore it one time buttoned down, but you could tell it was too big. Next party I wore it unbuttoned and was easier to pull off. Good tacky sweater for a more authentic look.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Cute "ugly" sweater
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is more of a cute "ugly" sweater. The fit is fairly relaxed without being frumpy. I ordered the black color, and to my surprise the material does not attract fur and lint. While I don't think this sweater would win any ugly sweaters contests, it's a very cute holiday sweater at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: machappelow

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute and soft. I am normally between a Large and XLarge. I ordered the Large and it seems to be a little big. I'm thinking maybe I should have went with the Medium.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit, wrong version delivered.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the cardigan with red sleeves and got one with green. Not happy about that but at least it looks pretty nice on my belly bump 8 months pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: Orangebubbles

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The sweater is made out of quality material, and the pattern looks just like the photos. Can't wait to wear it for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Not the one I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly but not the one I ordered. “Believe” Christmas unicorn replaced by regular, not funny Santa and presents.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rand

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Just needed for a one-time party. Pleasantly surprised at how well made it is and I went up a size because I wanted to make sure it covered everything, and it's perfect! And really not that ugly. My elderly mom would've loved it! Very happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: BBK

customer_reviews.title: Very cute for the price. Runs big, I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute for the price. Runs big, I ordered a medium and at 7 months pregnant was still able to button it which was unexpected.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Soft, nice quality, fit true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an Ugly Christmas Sweater event- I sized up but think my regular size would have fit just fine. The sweater is soft, and the quality seems nice. I actually got a lot of compliments and people telling me “thats not ugly, its actually really nice”.
customer_reviews.author: MsMemo

customer_reviews.title: weird fit in the arms
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5/5 ordered the small and the sleeves were about four inches too short. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fits well for Tall People
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It`s so adorable and comfy. I read other reviews saying the arms are quite long, which I was excited about because i`m 5`11 and have abnormally long arms haha! I ordered an x-large which is what I usually get in sweaters because I like them to be a bit bigger and it fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Hess

customer_reviews.title: She Loved It.  Just Wish She Could Have Worn It.
customer_reviews.text: Was purchased as a gift for family member in a different state. She said it was way too big for her but really pretty. I tried to get a medium to replace it, but they were sold out at the time. I was disappointed since the description says it runs true to size, but that is the chance we take when ordering online.
customer_reviews.author: PennyPincher

customer_reviews.title: Not Ugly
customer_reviews.text: This sweater looks like some of my old nice sweaters only has yellow buttons. I wanted an "ugly" sweater. Returned!
customer_reviews.author: G. Buxton

customer_reviews.title: More cute than ugly
customer_reviews.text: Purchased of Christmas to wear for a contest, although to did not win I would defiantly keep for years to come. I purchased a large and it’s bigger than I would like but still wearable.
customer_reviews.author: Purchased

customer_reviews.title: This is a very comfortable sweater. I didn't want it to be super ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable sweater. I didn't want it to be super baggy, but it ended up being a but past my expectation, so I washed it and dried it on hot and it was perfect. And it's not really ugly. It's actually pretty cute.
customer_reviews.author: alison mayne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Blue Stands Out Among Ugly Sweaters
customer_reviews.text: I love this sweater! I ordered XXL because I was afraid it would be too small, but it is true to size. The sweater was a big hit at work and I cannot wait to find another excuse to wear it. VERY SATISFIED with this. I don't write reviews often, but this had to be said.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Sustaita

customer_reviews.title: Nice Christmas party sweater
customer_reviews.text: This was great for a Christmas party! Great quality and fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: TAG

customer_reviews.title: Great Sweater, super cozy, great with leggings.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a medium to be safe. I am 5'4" and weight 135 Ibs and this sweater was definitely long enough to wear with cute leggings. It's a bit large and sleeves a bit long but overall fit fine if you want a comfortable look. The sweater isn't itchy at all, it's actually really cozy and soft. I got a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute...
customer_reviews.text: Most reviews said this ran BIG....so I ordered a size down. Well, I should have stuck to my size. It did not run big. However, it is cute...
customer_reviews.author: MamaRox

customer_reviews.title: This sweater was really pretty but I have the fact that the label says ...
customer_reviews.text: This sweater was really pretty but I have the fact that the label says 'UGLY CHRISTMAS SWEATER'. It was a gift and that label really bothered me!
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Koenig

customer_reviews.title: The perfect "Ugly" Christmas Sweater!
customer_reviews.text: I needed an "ugly" Christmas sweater for a party at work, and this was perfect, but it really isn't all that ugly! Yes, I'd never wear it out in public, but it is actually really well made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: BookcaseLaura

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sweater just way too big for me a small was like a large. I will have to return it since I was not able to wear it
customer_reviews.author: Yomy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great! I am a size 14 and it was perfect. confortable and warm too.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Ugly and Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is awesomely ugly and perfect. Additionally-the quality is exceptional, especially given the price. I ordered a large which is what I generally wear in tops, and it fits loose, as I would expect a cardigan of this kind to fit. Highly recommend this for your holiday ugly sweater parties!
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Nice n cozy
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was hoping for nice and cozy and lose.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this sweater. I always order my cardigans a size larger, so they are baggy. It fit perfectly for what I wanted. The quality is a lot nicer than I expected. I think it will last for quite a few seasons.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Cute Ugly Sweater
customer_reviews.text: Cute sweater, even though it is ugly! Nice quality, fits nicely as expected. The only thing is there is a funny smell to it, but when I washed it, it went away.
customer_reviews.author: GaleLL

customer_reviews.title: Upper sleeves too baggy on me.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the length, color and design but the sleeves were too baggy in the upper arm area with about 4 inches too much material around the diameter of my arms. I usually order XL sweaters and a previous sweater I ordered by this company was a perfect fit, so this was a bit of a disappointment. Otherwise, it’s a great Christmas sweater.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn ikuta

customer_reviews.title: Cute but size down
customer_reviews.text: Cute for ugly Christmas party with additions! Definitely size down
customer_reviews.author: Cassie H.

customer_reviews.title: Not ugly!
customer_reviews.text: If you like sweaters a little baggy then order your regular size.
customer_reviews.author: George Huxhold

customer_reviews.title: it fit exactly like i was hoping
customer_reviews.text: I followed the advice of other reviewers and ordered a size smaller than what i generally where. it fit exactly like i was hoping. It's definitely not form fitting, more so like a very comfortable oversized sweater. It is long. Would certainly purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha M. Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: Great Sweater
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'6" ordered a medium, it fit really well. Got lots of complements when I wore it.. I am well pleased with the quality of sweater, it is labeled Ugly Sweater, but I beg to differ. I would recommend this item...
customer_reviews.author: peggy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and soft!
customer_reviews.text: Sweater was very comfortable and soft! However, it does run a bit large. If it was available I would have gone down from a M to a S.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty * Ugly Christmas Sweater*
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sweater and great color combination....very good quality....unfortunately I had to return it as was too large for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Bulky and hangs droopy. On the larger size and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bulky and hangs droopy. On the larger size and not true to size. I'd suggest ordering a size down.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Great for holiday sweater party
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for a holiday sweater party. Cotton so not too hot for Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia A A

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality
customer_reviews.text: This is very good quality for such a low price. Overall very comparable to the much more expensive ugly Christmas sweaters.
customer_reviews.author: Coopty Loop

customer_reviews.title: great Shristmas sweater
customer_reviews.text: finally found a Christmas sweater i liked and it fit well
customer_reviews.author: wildmom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Fits well
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. Good quality. Fits well. Will be perfect for all my Christmas fun.
customer_reviews.author: Patti A. Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on this, the picture they use is not actually the color of the sweater. They send you one with green sleeves not red. Im going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Javier R.

customer_reviews.title: Great sweater!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this sweater to a Christmas party with leggings, I got the large, but a medium would have been a better fit. It's a great sweater, well made. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Good Christmas sweater.
customer_reviews.text: Sweater was perfect for Christmas. Order your size it’ll be a perfect fit. Thick material good material.
customer_reviews.author: Nidia

customer_reviews.title: Great sweater!
customer_reviews.text: You know, this was billed as an "ugly" Christmas sweater, but I liked it! Comfortable cotton, appropriate sentiment, fit right in with the crowd! High marks for this!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Galbraith

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just what i wanted. I got a larger size. I like to feel comfy
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Kos

customer_reviews.title: Tasteful
customer_reviews.text: Very tasteful. Not an ugly sweater at all Love iut.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Not ugly, great fit, great price!
customer_reviews.text: The sweater is cute and colorful, arrived quickly, very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The large is like an extra large, but its a nice sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Dharma N Nargen

customer_reviews.title: Not "ugly" at all!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute Christmas sweater and it fit great. I got a size M and it was perfect. I don't think this is an ugly sweater at all and look forward to wearing it next Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: DixieDoodle

customer_reviews.title: A+A+A+ I really like this sweater. Not an ugly one at all!!!
customer_reviews.text: Isn't an "Ugly" sweater at all! A lot of fun to wear and definitely keeps me warm. So excited to get this today. Thank you! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Ugly Sweater turned Cutest.
customer_reviews.text: Need a sweater for an ugly sweater contest at work. I decided to make it a little more ugly, but ended up with the cutest sweater! Booo (because I feel it's ugly). Proof that beauty is in the eye of the beholder. I had added too much bling, perhaps. Overall it fit great!
customer_reviews.author: ZoomMD

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Too cute to be ugly!! Took off a star as it run large.
customer_reviews.author: starburst2080

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This sweater sure is UGLY!! Haha! It's perfect for an ugly sweater party. Honestly it's a really well made sweater. Very warm. I think it will last many years.
customer_reviews.author: Gbigs

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Sweater is very heavy weight and kind of itchy, but very well made. Looks just like the picture. I'm 5'1" 145lbs size 10/12 this fit a little big on me but still looked nice. It is long enough to cover booty.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my mom to wear on Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom to wear on Christmas Eve. She loves it. It fits perfectly and did not shrink when washed.
customer_reviews.author: Casey H

customer_reviews.title: ... to be made of a decent quality which is nice. Because I bought this as an "ugly Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected and seems to be made of a decent quality which is nice. Because I bought this as an "ugly Christmas sweater" there is plenty of room to get creative and ugly-it-up! That said, it is a comfy sweater at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: betsy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits great (I'm a skinny 6 footer with a straight build, I got the Small) and is nice(for an ugly xmas sweater!)!
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Product was fine but delivery was horrible! Almost a week later that promised date.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Not an ugly CHRISTmas sweater!
customer_reviews.text: I like the sweater very much. It actually isn't an ugly sweater but I'll wait it. Its made well.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Christmas fun with this ugly sweater
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what I hoped Good fit and perfect ugly sweater. Love it
customer_reviews.author: nancy herbert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great quality. But it's on the smaller side. I had to order a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good quality, and fits with a loose
customer_reviews.text: Actually, this is not an ugly sweater, but is cheerful and festive, with the holiday print. Warm, too. I have gotten several compliments on it, and did wear it to an Ugly Sweater party. Seems to be good quality, and fits with a loose, large fit.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Young

customer_reviews.title: but I LOVE it and would not call it ugly at all
customer_reviews.text: I needed this sweater for work and ordered late. Paid extra for fast arrival and arrived on time. A very dependable and trustworthy company. I know the brand is an "Ugly Sweater", but I LOVE it and would not call it ugly at all. Fits well (I wear an XL), a little long, but I'm short (about 5 Foot). It's warm and beautiful colors. Would recommend an "Ugly Sweater" to everyone from this company!
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy sweater. Runs a little large. Wish it had pockets but it was fine for party.
customer_reviews.author: Sllovelylady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Arrived exactly on time its prefect I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sweater
customer_reviews.text: Received lots of compliments. Fits well, very colorful and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: JT Chip

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality material!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality material, front is thick, overall nice and cozy. I am 5’7” and 135lbs - ordered a Medium. The Fit is somewhat large, but i was wanting it a tad loose in case it shrinks when I wash it since it is 100% cotton. This will definitely work as a (not so ugly) ugly Christmas sweater!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Barnier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute, ugly sweater. Arrived quickly, packaged well. Will probably wear it several times this holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma to 6

customer_reviews.title: Not an Ugly Christmas Sweater
customer_reviews.text: Good sweater for the price. Runs large and ordered a size down which worked out nicely. Received more compliments that the sweater was nice not ugly.
customer_reviews.author: trucks are #1

customer_reviews.title: Cute sweater
customer_reviews.text: I love this sweater. Very soft, warm and comfortable. However, the medium fits like a large. Too big for me. I tried shrinking it in the washer and dryer with hot water and heat but it hasn't shrunk much.
customer_reviews.author: Let's be honest...

customer_reviews.title: Cute “ugly” sweater
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is of surprisingly good quality. It’s warm and really cute
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: The sweater is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My sister and I always buy holiday clothing to wear during the season. This sweater will be perfect
customer_reviews.author: Nana of boys

customer_reviews.title: The sweater is beautiful it fit her perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I got the sweater from my mom for ugly Christmas theme. The sweater is beautiful it fit her perfectly. I even washed it and it stayed the same didn't stretch or anything. I'm really happy I got this for her she said it was very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Gurmeet Ahluwalia

customer_reviews.title: It is not ugly
customer_reviews.text: I love this sweater and I do not think is ugly at all. It is colorful and funny , make me smile. Also it is very well done. Very good quality and look like is trendy again, what make me happy, because one of the American Christmas traditions is back. Thanks . Eva D.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The material is very soft and comfortable. The fit is just right
customer_reviews.text: The material is very soft and comfortable. The fit is just right. Not too big/too tight. The only problem I have had is some people have told me it is not ugly at all, and they think it is pretty cute. Either way it was fun to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Minnick

feature_bullets: Be the hit of the Christmas party
